a3: Documentation should be produced at all stages of the project

question: string[] names = {"Manu", "Ariana", "Tia", "Hone"} Which loop will write out the names to the console?
a2: int i = 0; while( i < names.length) {   Console.WriteLine(names[i]); }
a3: for(int i = 1; i <= names.length; i++) {   Console.WriteLine(names[i]); }

question: A class called Student has public properties Name, Age, Address A Dictionary called students is to store a series of Student objects, based on the student Name. Given that variable called student has been created – which of the following will add student to the dictionary
a3: Students.add(Student.name,Student);

a3: code is written for an important public occasion

question: What is unit testing

question: Which of the following will convert a string s to an integer num?
a3: num =(int) s;

question: why is a base case important in recursion?
a1: without it the recursion would never start
a2: The base case is the first call  before the recursion starts
a3: Without a base case calling the recursion would usually result in a stack overflow.

question: What is Blackbox Testing?
a1: White box testing is an approach that allows testers to inspect and verify the inner workings of a software
a3: black box testing is testing that take place without knowledge of a programs inner workings

question: What is the defintion of white box testing
a2: Testing which takes place with knowledge of the inner workings of the program
a3: testing which takes place without knowledge of the inner workings of the program

question: Wich of the following statements is true

a2: Reference data types are created on the stack, Value data types are created on the heap
